items.sentence: Tom and Mary are waiting for you in the lobby.
Tom told me that he plans on joining the team.
Tom told me that he wanted to teach me French.
Tom told me that he was determined to do that.
Tom seldom sings, but I think he will tonight.
Tom speaks English with a heavy French accent.
Tom speaks French better than his father does.
Tom spent the whole night thinking about Mary.
Tom spent the whole night worrying about Mary.
Mary took twice as long as Tom to get dressed.
Mary works as a cleaning lady in a restaurant.
The United Nations Building was built in 1952.
The coach told me I needed to practice harder.
It\'s too bad you can\'t stay a little longer.
Tom abandoned his family and went into hiding.
Tom abuses his authority, so no one likes him.
Tom accepted our offer and joined our company.
Tom accepted the proposal without reservation.
Tom accepts that what Mary said was the truth.
Tom actually was the one who wrote the letter.
